interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Broadway Musicals: A Jewish Legacy
Review Date: 2013/08/25
Store: Joel Grey  (Actor),     Michael Kantor  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Documentary
Product Description: ['Recent Peabody Award winner as seen on PBS', "Performances by Matthew Broderick, Kelli O'Hara, Zero Mostel, Nathan Lane, Barbra Streisand, Idina Menzel, Kristin Chenoweth, and many more  Engaging, humorous, and provocative,", 'Broadway Musicals: A Jewish Legacy', "examines the unique role of Jewish composers and lyricists in the creation of the modern American musical. The film showcases the work of legends such as Irving Berlin, Jerome Kern, George and Ira Gershwin, Lorenz Hart, Richard Rodgers, Oscar Hammerstein II, Leonard Bernstein, and Stephen Sondheim. Interviews with songwriters and luminaries including Sheldon Harnick, Stephen Schwartz, Harold Prince, Arthur Laurents, Charles Strouse, and Mel Brooks provide insight, alongside standout performances and archival footage.  Narrated by Tony® and Academy Award® winner Joel Grey, this entertaining documentary mingles cultural history with illuminating perspectives on the origins and meanings of some of Broadway's most beloved songs, stories, and shows."]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Special Interests', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Joel Grey, Michael Kantor', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 24 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '26355977', 'Director': 'Michael Kantor', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 24 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 7, 2013', 'Actors': 'Joel Grey', 'Studio': 'Acorn', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: This has great songs and music and raw footage of the old stars. It was both very informative and enjoyable!
Review Title: Wonderful DVD
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Sid the Science Kid: Sid in Motion Sid the Science Kid (Actor), Katy Garretson (Director), David Gumpel (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family ["Sid the Science Kid ™ is trying out his new dance, Sid Slide to the Side, on his hardwood floors when he discovers that friction prevents him from sliding in his sneakers. When he plays ball, he quickly learns that if a ball doesn't have enough elasticity, it won't bounce! This calls for some serious investigating! After pretending to be Super Sid by kicking the ball with all his might, Sid and his friends take a trip to the Science Center to investigate how using lots of force makes things move far and fast! Join Sid and his friends as they explore the laws of motion!"] {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8646994', 'Director': 'Katy Garretson, David Gumpel', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Animated, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 minute', 'Release date': 'January 10, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sid the Science Kid', 'Studio': 'Ncircle', 'Number of discs': '1'} Sid the science kid is a must for young kids. My grandson starting watching it at age three and has picked up an amazing vocabulary and science concepts. I find it entertaining, too. Quick delivery, reliable seller. One of the best! Sid the Science Kid: Sense-Ational Adventures Sid and Friends (Actor), The Jim Henson Company (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family ["Did you hear that? Can you see this? What's that smell? Sid and his friends are embarking on a quest to explore vision, hearing, touch, smell and taste! Sid wonders why the tag on his shirt is really itchy so his class explores all the different textures around them. Sid is curious about why Grandma's glasses help her see clearly, but make things blurry for him. But when it comes to hearing, is it possible that Sid has super powers? Find out all about Sid's Super Duper Senses and find out about your own senses in these sense-sational stories!"] {'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6313446', 'Director': 'The Jim Henson Company', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 55 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 4, 2011', 'Actors': 'Sid and Friends', 'Studio': 'Ncircle', 'Number of discs': '1'} Sid the science kid is a must for young kids. My grandson starting watching it at age three and has picked up an amazing vocabulary and science concepts. I find it entertaining, too. Quick delivery, reliable seller. Sid is GREAT!!!! Directed by Robert Altman.'] {'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Director': 'Robert Altman', 'Media Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, DVD, Subtitled, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'June 4, 2002', 'Actors': 'Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Rene Auberjonois, William Devane, John Schuck', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Japanese', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1), French (Dolby Digital 2.0), English (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Studio': 'Warner Home Video', 'Writers': 'Edmund Naughton, Robert Altman, Brian McKay', 'Number of discs': '1'} If you are a Beatty and Christy fan, you will enjoy this movie. Worth watching for the scenery and music! profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Target Audience**: Focused on children's educational content for preschool-aged kids while also showing an interest in classic films and Broadway musicals.
- **Content Preference**: Strong preference for animated, science-oriented shows that blend entertainment with learning, alongside a growing appreciation for documentaries and classic cinema featuring renowned actors and directors. Continues to emphasize nurturing vocabulary development and foundational science concepts.
- **Review Behavior**: Consistently leaves positive reviews highlighting both educational value and entertainment quality. Recently expanded this behavior to include documentaries, exemplifying a balanced taste in media. Values a reliable purchasing experience and trustworthy sellers.
- **Emotional Connection**: Maintains a personal connection to the content, referencing a grandchild’s enjoyment, which suggests a family-oriented approach to selecting media that promotes educational growth while also enjoying films personally. Exhibits increased interest in cultural history and the arts.
- **Engagement Level**: Actively seeks materials that are both entertaining and cognitive-developmental, recently praising a documentary for its engaging exploration of music and cultural history. Values aesthetic and auditory experiences in both children's programming and classic films.

Overall, the user prioritizes high-quality children's media that supports learning objectives while enjoying enriching documentaries and classic cinematic experiences, reflecting a proactive engagement in enhancing educational growth through varied media.
